item.title: MyProject code update (bug FOR-1190)
item.description:
code update by DC (fixes bug FOR-1190)
:
Rendered element "sections" now have a title, so will show properly in the table of contents. Also sorted the list of elements alphabetically.

item.title: MyProject code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Use the locationmap to expose internal resources.

item.title: MyProject admin update
item.description:
admin update by RDG :
Renamed to bring into line with our naming conventions.

item.title: MyProject code add
item.description:
code add by DC :
Added better sitemap match using regexp to deal with sub-directories too.

item.title: MyProject docs add
item.description:
docs add by DC :
Added samples for xdoc-v2.0 and xdoc-v1.3 collections of DTDs.

item.title: MyProject admin add
item.description:
admin add by DC :
Initial plugin, moving stuff out of forrest core.
